announcement.goals.kinswathe.cook: See players that eat through walls!
announcement.goals.kinswathe.physician: See poisoned players through walls and treat them.
announcement.goals.kinswathe.robot: A machine devoid of any emotion.
tip.kinswathe.drugmaker.posion_failed: It seems to be immune to poisoning...
announcement.goals.kinswathe.licensed_vi: You might still retain a shred of conscience...
game.win.kinswathe.licensed_villain: The licensed villain ended everyone's life!
item.kinswathe.blowgun.tooltip:
Point, right-click and shoot
Target that be shooted will be poisoned
90 seconds cooldown
item.kinswathe.medical_kit.tooltip:
Use on a player to remove poison
1 minute cooldown
item.kinswathe.pan.tooltip:
Attack to knock back / push a player
15 seconds cooldown
item.kinswathe.poison_injector.tooltip:
Use on a player to poison it
If target have been poisoned, directly cause death
90 seconds cooldown
item.kinswathe.sulfuric_acid_barrel.tool:
Use on a dead body to dissolve it
1 minute cooldown
